Articles.Content:
Hi there folks!

My name is Thiago, I'm a 31 years old Brazilian and I am an addict... to Kerbal Space Program!

Been playing KSP for a little over a month now, noticed it on steam frontpage and thought "ahh, just a little bit... I can quit whenever I want!".. Oh boy, was I wrong? haha

I had yet to introduce myself here, but I've been lurking around the forums, soaking on the wisdom of more experienced Kerbonauts, downloading mods and watching youtube videos for some time now.

I am still quite "green" though, haven't been anywhere further than Minmus, and now I am trying my hand on a SSTO spaceplane.. I've managed to takeoff, achieve a stable orbit, deploy a payload, return to atmosphere and land at KSC, just not all of these at once!

But we're getting there...

Just want to thanks Squad and the Dev team for such an enormously fun --and educational-- game, and also thanks the community and moderators for being so helpful (even though I haven't directly interacted with anyone).

Cheers!
Welcome to KSP and the KSP Forums!
Oh yeah, beat you, Cap'n Skunky!
